TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit PngBitmapEncoder extends System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapEncoder
Public NotInheritable Class PngBitmapEncoder Inherits BitmapEncoder

summary.span: 定義編碼器以用來編碼可攜式網路圖形 (PNG) 格式影像。

span.span: Defines an encoder that is used to encode Portable Network Graphics (PNG) format images.

remarks.format: ## Remarks [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 格式的點陣圖支援畫面格層級中繼資料。 format bitmaps support frame level metadata. 它們不支援預覽、 全域縮圖、 框架層級的縮圖、 全域中繼資料或多個框架。They do not support preview, global thumbnails, frame level thumbnails, global metadata, or multiple frames. 編碼不在部分信任中運作。Encoding does not work in partial trust. 請參閱[WPF 部分信任安全性](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md)的部分信任的詳細資訊。See [WPF Partial Trust Security](~/docs/framework/wpf/wpf-partial-trust-security.md) for information on partial trust.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列範例示範如何初始化至新的點陣圖影像編碼。The following example demonstrates how to initialize a to encode a new bitmap image. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption Interlace { System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption get(); void set(System::Windows::Media::Imaging::PngInterlaceOption value); };

summary.span: 取得或設定值，這個值表示是否應該對 [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] 點陣圖進行交錯處理。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that indicates whether the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] bitmap should interlace.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 交錯式顯示的程序是指[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]兩個欄位中的框架。Interlacing refers to the process of displaying a [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] frame in two fields. 一個欄位包含偶數行範圍內，而另一個欄位包含奇數行的畫面格。One field contains the even lines of the frame, and the other field contains the odd lines of the frame. 當[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)]是檢視，一個欄位中的程式會先顯示，並且第二個欄位中的行就會顯示。When the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_png](~/includes/tla2sharptla-png-md.md)] is viewed, the lines in one field are displayed first, and then the lines in the second field are displayed. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何使用屬性。The following example demonstrates how to use the property. [!code-cpp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CPP/PngEncoderDecoder.cpp#3)] [!code-csharp[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/CSharp/PngEncoderDecoder.cs#3)] [!code-vb[pngbitmapdecoderencoder#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PngBitmapDecoderEncoder/VB/PngEncoderDecoder.vb#3)]
